Articles.Content:
Ok, so we\'ve pretty much mastered landing and orbiting the moon, but what about a space station? Try to get the largest space station into place. It can orbit the moon at any height ( bonus points for very low orbit.)

Parts allowed:

Wobbly Rockets

Silisko parts.

Space station accessories (Solar panels, satellites, etc. No thrusters)

Ion Engines.

Good luck Kerbalians, and godspeed. ;D

EDIT: Low orbits are considered 700 meters and lower.

Do Solar Orbits count?

Probably not, those are easy.

And technically, even before takeoff you are in a solar orbit.
I\'ll give this ago with my oversized Peacekeeper space station. Report in later.
Going to try this with my S-1 Proxima.
I\'ll try this using Vanilla Parts, I will report the outcome.
